name: Back2Back Urny - Connecticut - Seventy
additionalNotes: Introduced in 2018, the Back2Back URNY Connecticut is a collaboration between urban artists URNY (UR New York) and Swiss tobacco giant Davidoff. Wanting to emphasize the importance of quality, thought-provoking presentations in the world of premium cigars, the Back2Back URNY line arrives packaged with gorgeous, collectible, urban-inspired designs adorning its boxes that will undoubtedly cause you to momentarily forget what lies within. The Back2Back URNY Connecticut features a golden Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade wrapper, Mexican binder, and select Dominican filler which come together magnificently to allow this mild to medium-bodied blend to provide the ultra-premium taste and impeccable craftsmanship that Davidoff has become synonymous with
